mapper.insert: insert into PHOIBE_SEARCH (ID, SEARCH_CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into PHOIBE_SEARCH
ID,
SEARCH_CONTENT,
USER_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update PHOIBE_SEARCH
SEARCH_CONTENT = #{searchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEARCH_CONTENT from (select SEARCH_CONTENT,ROWNUM rno from (select SEARCH_CONTENT from PHOIBE_SEARCH group by SEARCH_CONTENT order by count(SEARCH_CONTENT) desc)) where rno between 1 and 11
mapper.delete: delete from PHOIBE_SEARCH where ID in (select t.id from (SELECT a.ID id,rownum rno FROM ( select ID from PHOIBE_SEARCH where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME desc ) a ) t WHERE t.rno > 10)
mapper.select: select SEARCH_CONTENT from PHOIBE_SEARCH where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by CREATE_TIME desc
select count(*) from PHOIBE_SEARCH where SEARCH_CONTENT = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
